title: Optimizing Predictive Analytics-Based Science Learning Design and Assessment (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Targets intermediate science learners with asynchronous LMS-based instruction. Comprehensive understanding is assessed through project-based evaluations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science learning activity data using predictive analytics tools and apply insights to improve instructional design
Learners can understand and apply an integrated process of LD (Learning Design) and LA (Learning Analytics) to real-world projects
Learners can diagnose issues in instructional design by comparing learning activity data with predictive model results and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
